name: transit
description:
The transit command extracts public transport stops and stations from OSM data. It identifies:

- Bus stops and bus stations
- Train stations and halts
- Tram stops
- Subway/metro entrances
- Ferry terminals

Includes operator, network, and accessibility information.

options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)
options.--type: Transit type: bus, rail, tram, subway, ferry, all (default: all)

output:
Transit stops/stations with:
- transit_type: Mode of transport
- feature_type: stop, station, platform, etc.
- name: Stop/station name
- ref: Reference number
- operator: Transport operator
- network: Transit network
- routes: Route references
- wheelchair: Accessibility
